dt-option.name: language.searchBuilder.condition
dt-option.summary: Set the placeholder text for the SearchBuilder condition `-tag select` element

type.description: `-init language.searchBuilder.condition` changes what will be displayed for the SearchBuilder's condition select.

dt-option.description: This will set the placeholder text for the condition `-tag select` element, by default this is `'Condition'`. This dom element is available in custom conditions and plugins also.
